targets.query: SELECT ("ms_per_read_op" + "ms_per_write_op")/2 FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Xtremio' AND "array" = 'sa0319xtm01' AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Read Latency, Write Latency, and Average Latency

targets.query: SELECT ("reads_per_sec" + "writes_per_sec") FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Xtremio' AND "array" = 'sa0319xtm01' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "reads_per_sec" FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Xtremio' AND "array" = 'sa0319xtm01' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "writes_per_sec" FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Xtremio' AND "array" = 'sa0319xtm01' AND $timeFilter
SELECT ("output_per_sec" + "input_per_sec") FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Xtremio' AND "array" = 'sa0319xtm01' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "input_per_sec" FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Xtremio' AND "array" = 'sa0319xtm01' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "output_per_sec" FROM "performance" WHERE "time" > (now() - 1m) AND "type" = 'Xtremio' AND "array" = 'sa0319xtm01' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "pct_used" FROM "capacity" WHERE "time" > (now() - 2h) AND "type" = 'Xtremio' AND "array" = 'sa0319xtm01' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total_capacity_tb" FROM "capacity" WHERE "time" > (now() - 2h) AND "type" = 'Xtremio' AND "array" = 'sa0319xtm01' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total_used_tb" FROM "capacity" WHERE "time" > (now() - 2h) AND "type" = 'Xtremio' AND "array" = 'sa0319xtm01' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total_free_tb" FROM "capacity" WHERE "time" > (now() - 2h) AND "type" = 'Xtremio' AND "array" = 'sa0319xtm01' AND $timeFilter
